title: [Furnace Fun] Looking to form a Team (Bronze/Silver/Gold)
body:
Looking to form a Ranked Team.
I accept players from all age groups (Though older players preferred.) and you must be able to communicate with the team; A means to chat through voice is strongly preferred.

Application Format:
What's your In-Game Name?: 
How old are you?: 
What Champions do you Main?: 
Whats your Main Role?: 
Where do you live?: 
Do you have a Microphone?: 
Do you have any means of Voice Communication?:

Example Application: 
What's your In-Game Name?: MoodswingModz
How old are you?: 17
What Champions do you Main?: Aatrox and Udyr
Whats your Main Role?: ADC
Where do you live?: Parramatta, Sydney, Australia
Do you have a Microphone?: Yes
Do you have any means of Voice Communication?: Teamspeak, Skype, Raidcall and Mumble.

Please add your Application below, At the moment i'm accepting any members as long as you aren't Low Priority or had any previous Leaver Buster bans on record.

*Yes, That is a reference to Banjo Kazooie.*
